text: Abo ni bo bahakanye bakanabakumira (mwebwe abemeramana) kugana Umusigiti Mutagatifu (w’i Maka), ndetse bakanafatira amatungo yari aziritse (yagombaga gutangwaho ibitambo) ntagere aho yagenewe gutambirwa. Iyo hataba abemeramana b’abagabo n’abemeramana b’abagore (bari mu banzi banyu mwari muhanganye) mutari muzi, mwari kubica cyangwa mukabahutaza mutabizi; nuko bikabatera umugayo (mukabarwaho icyaha) ku byo mutari muzi. (Ibyo byabayeho) kugira ngo Allah agirire impuhwe uwo ashaka. (Ariko abo bemeramana) iyo baza kuba bitandukanyije (n’abahakanyi), abahakanye muri bo twari kubahanisha ibihano bibabaza
